overview: Ty Fox fulfills his film fantasy by starring in a true-to-life feature about his days as an all-American football player and his struggle with coming to terms with his feelings for his teammates. The Catalina cameras take you magnificently to the nation's capital and back again as you tag along with Ty on his hard action reenactment. It's a story about any boy from Anytown, USA, that ever had to wrestle with an attraction to his buddies and a desire stronger than ever felt to rise and prove that he can be the Cream Of The Crop.
title: Cream of the Crop
